channel.title: CVE Feed for Pip maintainers -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pip maintainers -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5752|2024-08-02T08:07:32.609Z -- pip%20maintainers -- pip
item.description: When installing a package from a Mercurial VCS URL (ie "pip install hg+...") with pip prior to v23.3, the specified Mercurial revision could be used to inject arbitrary configuration options to the "hg clone" call (ie "--config"). Controlling the Mercurial configuration can modify how and which repository is installed. This vulnerability does not affect users who aren't installing from Mercurial.
